name: XYZ
description:
This is a survival RPG game
--
On another barren island
People lack the most basic survival supplies
Their biggest problem is basically survival
They lack food, water, and various necessities for daily life
They are constantly under various threats!
As a member of this small island, can you protect yourself? Let oneself survive?
--
The game will have three playable characters
Their names are X, Y, Z!
Currently, X can complete basic game operations and play normally
Y only provides preview, we will improve and update it in the near future
Z is already in production
---
